metadata.name: High Court Bail Application
metadata.description: Bail application template for filing before High Courts under Section 439 CrPC/BNSS. Follows High Court formatting standards with 3.5cm margins.

required_fields.label: Applicant Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the accused/applicant seeking bail

required_fields.label: Applicant Address
required_fields.description: Complete residential address of the applicant

required_fields.label: FIR Number
required_fields.description: First Information Report number with year

required_fields.label: Police Station
required_fields.description: Name and district of the police station where FIR is registered

required_fields.label: Sections Charged
required_fields.description: Penal sections under which the accused is charged

required_fields.label: Date of Arrest
required_fields.description: Date when the applicant was taken into custody

required_fields.label: Grounds for Bail
required_fields.description: Legal grounds and circumstances justifying the grant of bail
required_fields.example: The applicant is a first-time offender with no criminal antecedents and has cooperated with investigation.

required_fields.label: Relief Sought
required_fields.description: Specific bail relief being requested from the Court
required_fields.example: Regular bail on such terms and conditions as this Hon'ble Court deems fit

optional_fields.label: Surety Details
optional_fields.description: Details of proposed surety including name, address, and occupation
optional_fields.example: Smt. Kamla Devi, W/o Applicant, residing at same address

optional_fields.label: Previous Bail Applications
optional_fields.description: Details of any prior bail applications filed and their outcomes
optional_fields.example: First bail application before this Hon'ble Court

template_content:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF _______________
AT _______________

CRIMINAL MISC. BAIL APPLICATION NO. _____ OF _____

IN THE MATTER OF:

{applicant_name}
... Applicant

VERSUS

State of _______________
... Opposite Party

APPLICATION UNDER SECTION 439 Cr.P.C./BNSS FOR GRANT OF BAIL

Most Respectfully Showeth:

1. That the applicant is in judicial custody since {date_of_arrest} in connection with {fir_number} registered at {police_station}.

2. That the applicant has been charged under {sections_charged}.

3. GROUNDS:
{grounds_for_bail}

PRAYER:
It is, therefore, most respectfully prayed that this Hon'ble Court may graciously be pleased to:

{relief_sought}

And for this act of kindness, the applicant shall forever pray.
